name: DeepPCA
full_name: Deep Autoencoder for Robust Principal Component Analysis
paper: Robust, Deep and Inductive Anomaly Detection.
description: DeepPCA is following the same principle as PCA-based anomaly detection. However, DeepPCA is using a deep autoencoder to benefit from nonlinear activation function.
